name: iSnowdome
description:
Quite possibly the most beautiful snow dome simulator on the App Store, iSnowdome is a magical, photorealistic simulation of the classic snow dome, with a Christmas theme.

Choose one of the included HD images, one from your own photo library or take a photo from within the app.

Add a message and send your personalised video greeting to your friends and family this Christmas.

Features:

- realistic snow particle simulation
- photorealistic raytrace rendering
- HD Retina Display support
- magical clockwork soundtrack
- shake to restart music
